005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.MetaschemaDataTypeProvider;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidValueForCastFunctionException;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.impl.NcNameItemImpl;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.IAtomicOrUnionType;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.InvalidTypeMetapathException;
013
014import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
015
016/**
017 * An atomic Metapath item containing a non-colonized name (NCName) data value.
018 */
019@Deprecated(forRemoval = true, since = "0.7.0")
020public interface INcNameItem extends IStringItem {
021  /**
022   * Get the type information for this item.
023   *
024   * @return the type information
025   */
026  @NonNull
027  static IAtomicOrUnionType<INcNameItem> type() {
028    return MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.NCNAME.getItemType();
029  }
030
031  @Override
032  default IAtomicOrUnionType<INcNameItem> getType() {
033    return type();
034  }
035
036  /**
037   * Construct a new item using the provided string {@code value}.
038   *
039   * @param value
040   *          a string representing a NCName value
041   * @return the new item
042   */
043
044  @NonNull
045  static INcNameItem valueOf(@NonNull String value) {
046    try {
047      return new NcNameItemImpl(MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.NCNAME.parse(value));
048    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
049      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(
050          null,
051          String.format("Invalid non-colonized name value '%s'. %s",
052              value,
053              ex.getLocalizedMessage()),
054          ex);
055    }
056  }
057
058  /**
059   * Cast the provided type to this item type.
060   *
061   * @param item
062   *          the item to cast
063   * @return the original item if it is already this type, otherwise a new item
064   *         cast to this type
065   * @throws InvalidValueForCastFunctionException
066   *           if the provided {@code item} cannot be cast to this type
067   */
068  @NonNull
069  static INcNameItem cast(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
070    try {
071      return item instanceof INcNameItem
072          ? (INcNameItem) item
073          : valueOf(item.asString());
074    } catch (IllegalStateException | InvalidTypeMetapathException ex) {
075      // asString can throw IllegalStateException exception
076      throw new InvalidValueForCastFunctionException(ex);
077    }
078  }
079
080  @Override
081  default INcNameItem castAsType(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
082    return cast(item);
083  }
084}
